title: (x) Miramar Transporation logo condensed sans serif - Aurora {Lex}
content:
Well, it’s my turn, anyone know what font this is?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071021035020im_/http:/typophile.com/files/_images_Miramar%20Logo_5962.gif)

 [‹ (x) OmnicomGroup logo - ITC Stone Sans {Ralf Hermann}](http://web.archive.org/web/20071021035020/http:/typophile.com/node/36192 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Trasher Skateboarding Magazine logo tagline - Eurostile Extd {Stephen} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071021035020/http:/typophile.com/node/36024 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Asvetic

comments.content:
Looks like Aurora. I’ll check to make sure.

- Lex

[Aurora Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20071021035020/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/bitstream/aurora_condensed_ot/) is too narrow. This could be stretched horizontally or possibly predigital.

- Lex
Judging by the quality of the logo, I’d say it was stretched. I appreciate your help on this Lex.
